SELECT INFS.INF_ID ,INFS.SHEET_TYPE ,INFS.DEGREE_TYPE ,INFS.SENDER_ID ,E1.EMP_NAME AS SENDER_NAME ,INFS.EMP_SEND_ID ,E2.EMP_NAME AS EMP_SEND_NAME ,INFS.DEPT_SEND_ID ,DEPT1.DEPT_NAME AS DEPT_SEND_NAME ,INFS.SEND_DATE ,INFS.DEPT_REC_ID ,DEPT2.DEPT_NAME AS DEPT_REC_NAME ,INFS.EMP_REC_ID ,E3.EMP_NAME AS EMP_REC_NAME ,INFS.EMP_ID ,E4.EMP_NAME EMP_NAME ,INFS.THEME ,INFS.CONTENT ,INFS.REQUIRE_CONTENT ,INFS.SEND_AGREE ,INFS.SEND_CONTENT ,INFS.SEND_APP_DATE ,INFS.REC_AGREE ,INFS.REC_CONTENT ,INFS.REC_APP_DATE ,INFS.STATE FROM INFORMATION_SHEET INFS LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEE E1 ON E1.EMP_ID = INFS.SENDER_ID LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEE E2 ON E2.EMP_ID = INFS.EMP_SEND_ID LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEE E3 ON E3.EMP_ID = INFS.EMP_REC_ID LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEE E4 ON E4.EMP_ID = INFS.EMP_ID LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT DEPT1 ON DEPT1.DEPT_ID = INFS.DEPT_SEND_ID LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT DEPT2 ON DEPT2.DEPT_ID = INFS.DEPT_REC_ID WHERE 1 = 1
AND INFS.INF_ID = #{infId}

SHEET_TYPE = #{sheefType},
DEGREE_TYPE = #{degreeType},
SENDER_ID = #{senderId},
EMP_SEND_ID = #{empSendId},

SEND_DATE = #{sendDate},
DEPT_REC_ID = #{deptRecId},
EMP_REC_ID = #{empRecId},
EMP_ID = #{empId},
THEME = #{theme},
CONTENT = #{content},
REQUIRE_CONTENT = #{requireContent},
SEND_AGREE = #{sendAgree},
SEND_CONTENT = #{sendContent},
SEND_APP_DATE = #{sendAppDate},
REC_AGREE = #{recAgree},
REC_CONTENT = #{recContent},
REC_APP_DATE = #{recAppDate},
STATE = #{state},
WHERE INF_ID = #{infId}
